Ingredients.4: 0.5 cup ginger liqueur (such as Domaine de Canton®)

Ingredients.7: 1 fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced

Directions.1: Steep hibiscus flowers in boiling water for 5 minutes; strain into a heatproof bowl set in a bowl of ice to speed cooling. Cool completely.

Directions.2: Transfer to a small pitcher. Stir in lime juice and ginger liqueur. Pour into ice-filled Collins glasses (about 5 oz. per glass) and top each with 1 oz. ginger beer. Garnish with mint sprigs and ginger slices.
